items.sentence: No sooner had Mary broken up with Tom than John was at her front door with a bunch of roses.
Mary said that her parents would kill her if they found out that she was going out with Tom.
When I entered the coffee shop, two young men were watching a wrestling match on television.
It seems to me that I've seen that person over there who's wearing glasses somewhere before.
We study for three hours every morning and spend the rest of our time working in the fields.
